title: Country Love
overview: The villagers actively responded to the village's "common prosperity" policy, and major enterprises in the village began to drive the villagers' economy and help the villagers achieve a well-off life. At the same time, Bai Qingming invested heavily in Wang Xiaomeng's tofu factory, which led to misunderstandings and conflicts between Bai Qingming and Li Yinping, Wang Xiaomeng and Xie Yongqiang, and even led to many families in the village facing love battles.
